scripts.node:machine-mock:docker:build: npm run node:machine-mock:build && docker build -t machine-mock -f src/machine-mock/Dockerfile .
scripts.node:machine-mock:docker:build-aarch64: npm run node:machine-mock:build && docker buildx build --platform linux/arm64 -t machine-mock-aarch64 -f src/machine-mock/Dockerfile --load .
scripts.node:db-exporter:docker:build: npm run node:db-exporter:build && docker build -t db-exporter -f src/db-exporter/Dockerfile .
scripts.node:db-exporter:docker:build-aarch64: npm run node:db-exporter:build && docker buildx build --platform linux/arm64 -t db-exporter-aarch64 -f src/db-exporter/Dockerfile --load .
scripts.node:opcua-connector:docker:build: npm run node:opcua-connector:build && docker build -t opcua-connector -f src/opcua-connector/Dockerfile .
scripts.node:opcua-connector:docker:build-aarch6: npm run node:opcua-connector:build && docker buildx build --platform linux/arm64 -t opcua-connector-aarch64 -f src/opcua-connector/Dockerfile --load .
scripts.node:input-material-scanner-connector:do: npm run node:input-material-scanner-connector:build && docker buildx build --platform linux/arm64 -t input-material-scanner-connector-aarch64 -f src/input-material-scanner-connector/Dockerfile --load .
scripts.node:machine-connector-v2:docker:build: npm run node:machine-connector-v2:build && docker build -t machine-connector-v2 -f src/machine-connector-v2/Dockerfile .
scripts.node:machine-connector-v2:docker:build-a: npm run node:machine-connector-v2:build && docker buildx build --platform linux/arm64 -t machine-connector-v2-aarch64 -f src/machine-connector-v2/Dockerfile --load .
